ygData.subject: Re: Request for Upper Gukk Spoiler - Bard Related
ygData.msgSnippet: 1 more question to add to this thread - how much do these go for?  I was lucky enuf to acquire a pair of elf-hide gloves (thank you Lamont :) already, and with
ygData.messageBody:
1 more question to add to this thread - how much do these go for? I was
lucky enuf to acquire a pair of elf-hide gloves (thank you Lamont :)
already, and with no other Bards in my normal party, I think these would be
great items to bring out and sell from our upcoming return to Guk. I am
currently "trying" to upgrade to Plate mail of some kind and am being
extremelly unsuccessful finding any medium bronze for sale, anywhere.
Aparently the mobs in Permafrost that carry it are well beyond my current
level (21). So, that leaves me with the option of buying steel plate.
OUCH! Needless to say, unless Bronze starts showing up, I'm gonna be
needing some heavy cash. : )

I had the idea of going to Cazic and trying to buy thrown away plate from
players who have just found Rubicite.... : )

Darkfox Reven'tsol - Xegony
(wishing he went wood elf) : )



>If anyone can help, you can either email me direct or post here with
>appropriate spoiler warning. Thanks!!!!
>
>I am looking for the Elfhide Gloves in Upper Guk. These are the +5 Agi and
>+5 dex gloves useble ONLY by Bards and Rogues. I was TOLD that they are on
>someone named "The Warden", who is supposedly the Warden of the jail cells
>in Upper Gukk. My group camped there for QUITE a long time this evening and
>never saw him once. Does anyone know exaclty where he spawns? Is there some
>sort of trigger? We kept seeing Knights and Warriors, but never a Warden.
>
>We are ALSO looking for the trollhide belt. Again, I was told this SAME
>invidual bears it. Is this true? If not, who has it, and where? And of
>course, is this ALSO a Bard/Rogue only item?
>
>THANK YOU for any help you can provide!
>
>Tim - Tallonn - Bertox
